EmailTemplate.name: 31OctWeb-SOW.SOW No Show
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you - Resources from our SOW Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
Thank you for attending our "The 3 Steps to a Successful Statement of Work (SOW)" webinar held on Thursday, October 31. Dan Pantaleo, Director of Proposal Operations at BAE, provided a 3 step approach to creating a strong SOW, outlining best practices for the scope of work, applicable documents and requirements sections of the document. Below you will find links to the material created for the webinar. Remember: the slides are copywritten material, so please do not repost or repurpose in any way. Recorded webinar <http://video.mbopartners.com/players/sMHR2491-mMm4x1IW.html> Webinar slide deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/SOWwebinarslides.pdf> Full SOI Report (PDF) <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/2013-MBO_Partners_State_of_Independence_Report.pdf> ___________________________________
Jaime MacDonell Marketing Manager MBO Partners t: 703-793-6368
e: jmacdonell@mbopartners.com
w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
